data: OB HIV High Risk / Unknown Postpartum (Module)
For a woman who is at high risk of HIV or has unknown HIV status
Pump breast milk and avoid infant feeding of breast milk until HIV negative status is confirmed by negative maternal HIV PCR result. Breastfeeding is contraindicated if known HIV positive
Confirm that intravenous zidovudine has been discontinued
If patient received single-dose nevirapine in labour, select lamiVUDine-zidovudine (COMBIVIR EQUIV)
1 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab
Contact Oak Tree Clinic 604-875-2250 (leave message after hours)
